content: üëâ Bitconia Crypto Lottery, an online lottery that is secure, uses smart contracts, RNG and BTC to distribute prizes and tickets. It is built on Binance Smart Chain (BSC), a decentralized network.¬† üëç

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Why'd almost none of the team on your project list or at least mention Bitconia on their employment record? Not even the CEO. Second, I know it is most likely a marketing words, but it doesn't hurt to ask, on which standard and what organization entitled you the best ICO for 2022?

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: Bitconia BIA on May 19, 2022, 06:24:31 AMPlease click the image and check the link you got to know each and every details about our project.Please visit our main post for more details - ¬†Bitconia AnnoncementDid that, both of them, and still didn't find answer for any of the two questions I asked. Unless you want to point me to the specific page where the information is written, I'll suggest that it'll be easier to share them here right away

comments.author: Bitconia BIA
comments.created_time: May 21, 2022, 06:58:49 AMLast edit: May 23, 2022, 07:56:04 PM by Bitconia BIA
comments.body: Please check the main post proparly -  BitconiaIn our main post we have added aboutProjectAuditWhite PaperRoad MapTeam Etc...

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: Bitconia BIA on May 21, 2022, 06:58:49 AMPlease check the main post proparly -  BitconiaIn main post added aboutProjectAuditRoad MapTeam Etc...Again, did that already. Three times now as I keep checking back just in case you've add those info, and since you didn't but keep insist on that answer for my questions... have you check my question properly?Two questions that I asked are simple. One, I am curious about why almost none of your team mentioned their employment on Bitconia, not even the CEO. The only thing that tied you with the CEO is that he works on Future Trends, which you also mentioned as your strategic partner, which unfortunately, their website couldn't do the same for you. So there goes the ties. I think it is quite justified if we questions whether those people you mentioned as part of your team really works for bitconia or you just borrowed their name without their consent. This issue is very easy to tackle, though, all they need to do is just updating their linkedin.Second, the award. Can't find which organization crowned you as the best ICO 2022

comments.author: GelesFinance
comments.body: Quote from: Bitconia BIA on May 21, 2022, 06:58:49 AMPlease check the main post proparly -  BitconiaIn main post added aboutProjectAuditRoad MapTeam Etc...It is interesting to understand what is the peculiarity and specificity of the token, and what is the demand for your token after the ICO is completed?

comments.author: Bitconia BIA
comments.created_time: May 23, 2022, 04:25:17 PMLast edit: May 25, 2022, 11:13:07 AM by Bitconia BIA
comments.body: Hello @ GelesFinance - Kindly check our white paper with all information here @ Bitconia White Paper

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: Bitconia BIA on May 23, 2022, 04:25:17 PMKindly check our white paper with all information here @ Bitconia White PaperYet again, I've done that, I even scanned through each page carefully, I didn't find which award it is. For the first question though, I am rather sit it can't be found on your whitepaper, your team need to update their employment record to match the claim that they're indeed spring for you. Otherwise, it'll open for an assumption that you just borrower random people's name without their consent
